message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and we can adjust in future rounds.
You wanted to start with 50/50, but I think I can do better than that. Let's see if you like my offer.
You tried to take advantage of me in the last round, but I'm not afraid to make a stronger offer. This time, I'll take 60% and leave you with 40%.
You think you're taking advantage of me, but I'm not afraid to counter. This time, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not going to give in to 60%.
